channel.title: CiTR -- The Saturday Edge
channel.description: Now in its 22nd year on CiTR, The Saturday Edge is my personal guide to & roots mu sic - with African, Latin and European music in the first half, followed by Celtic, Blues, Songwriters, Cajun and whatever else fits! steveedge3@mac.com
channel.itunes:summary: Now in its 22nd year on CiTR, The Saturday Edge is my personal guide to & roots mu sic - with African, Latin and European music in the first half, followed by Celtic, Blues, Songwriters, Cajun and whatever else fits! steveedge3@mac.com
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Now in its 22nd year on CiTR, Saturday Edge is a guide to world & roots music.
